## What is Artificial Intelligence?

AI needs data.

## Key open source projects

* PyTorch
* Tensorflow
* ONNX
* Spark
* Keras

## Why does AI matter in an open source cloud?

![survey results](images/survey-ai.png)

## Cloud comparison

| IBM Cloud | GCP | AWS | Azure |
| - | - | - | - |
| Watson Studio | MySQL | RDB | SQL |
